patthana15.7:1.1: Hetuṁ pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.7:2.1: Hetuṁ sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.7:3.1: Hetuṁ upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
